subsection.title: Leveleditor
subsection.p: There exist currently two level editors for SuperTux, one is the build-in editor that is included with SuperTux and accessible via the in-game menu, the other is the OpenGL based selfstanding generic Windstille editor and there is a third experimental one which supports slopes and other stuff, that won't be used in Milestone1.

subsubsection.title: Windstille Editor
subsubsection.p: The Windstille Editor currently requires OpenGL, beside from that the binary doesn't depend on anything. The editor should be useable, even so it might not be really perfect. If you miss a critical feature contact 'grumbel' on IRC.
